sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Salesforce.com topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 4.3%.
Year to date, Salesforce.com registers a 0.1% gain.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is The Gap, trading down 9.3%.
The Gap, is showing a gain of 12.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are First Solar, trading down 4.0%, and Ross Stores, trading up 4.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
